subject: College Athletics
Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Michigan has decided to make a run at big-time lacrosse. Its men’s team will be an N.C.A.A. Division I program next season, and the women will begin varsity competition the next year.
snippet: Michigan has decided to make a run at big-time lacrosse. Its men’s team will be an N.C.A.A. Division I program next season, and the women will begin varsity competition the next year.
